39.eng-name: The Book on the Description of Hellfire
39.ara-name: كتاب صفة جهنم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:"Whoever had the weight of a speck of faith in his heart will depart from the Fire." Abu Sa'eed said: "Whoever has doubt then let him recite: Indeed Allah does not deal unjustly with even the weight of a speck

chapter.eng-name: The Story of the Last of the People of the Fire to Leave It
